channel.title: Comments on: Happy Birthday To Me. I’m 37
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Moria
item.dc:creator: Moria
item.description:
Mazal Tov!!! Seems like you've been through many phases this year - I would call it: The year of change. It's always nice to figure where you feel belong for your next decisions :)
Wish you the best year and many more good phases this year... :)
item.content:encoded:
Mazal Tov!!!
Seems like you’ve been through many phases this year – I would call it: The year of change. It’s always nice to figure where you feel belong for your next decisions :)

Wish you the best year and many more good phases this year… :)
